property.name: base_url
property.description: The base url of your website as airflow cannot guess what domain or cname you are using. This is used in automated emails that airflow sends to point links to the right web server.

property.name: web_server_host
property.display-name: The ip specified when starting the web server.

property.name: web_server_port
property.description: The port on which to run the web server.

property.name: web_server_ssl_cert
property.description: Paths to the SSL certificate and key for the web server. When both are provided SSL will be enabled. This does not change the web server port.

property.name: web_server_ssl_key
property.description: Paths to the SSL certificate and key for the web server. When both are provided SSL will be enabled. This does not change the web server port.

property.name: web_server_master_timeout
property.description: Number of seconds the webserver waits before killing gunicorn master that doesn't respond.

property.name: web_server_worker_timeout
property.description: Number of seconds the gunicorn webserver waits before timing out on a worker.

property.name: worker_refresh_batch_size
property.description: Number of workers to refresh at a time. When set to 0, worker refresh is disabled. When nonzero, airflow periodically refreshes webserver workers by bringing up new ones and killing old ones.

property.name: worker_refresh_interval
property.description: Number of seconds to wait before refreshing a batch of workers.

property.name: secret_key
property.description: Secret key used to run your flask app.

property.name: workers
property.description: Number of workers to run the Gunicorn web server.

property.name: worker_class
property.description: The worker class gunicorn should use. Choices include sync (default), eventlet, gevent.

property.name: access_logfile
property.description: Log files for the gunicorn webserver. '-' means log to stderr.

property.name: error_logfile
property.description: Log files for the gunicorn webserver. '-' means log to stderr.

property.name: expose_config
property.description: Expose the configuration file in the web server.

property.name: authenticate
property.description: Set to true to turn on authentication: http://pythonhosted.org/airflow/security.html#web-authentication .

property.name: filter_by_owner
property.description: Filter the list of dags by owner name (requires authentication to be enabled).

property.name: owner_mode
property.description: Filtering mode. Choices include user (default) and ldapgroup. Ldap group filtering requires using the ldap backend. Note that the ldap server needs the "memberOf" overlay to be set up in order to user the ldapgroup mode.

property.name: dag_default_view
property.description: Default DAG view. Valid values are: tree, graph, duration, gantt, landing_times.

property.name: dag_orientation
property.description: Default DAG orientation. Valid values are: LR (Left->Right), TB (Top->Bottom), RL (Right->Left), BT (Bottom->Top).

property.name: demo_mode
property.description: Puts the webserver in demonstration mode; blurs the names of Operators for privacy.

property.name: log_fetch_timeout_sec
property.description: The amount of time (in secs) webserver will wait for initial handshake while fetching logs from other worker machine.

property.name: hide_paused_dags_by_default
property.description: By default, the webserver shows paused DAGs. Flip this to hide paused DAGs by default.

property.name: page_size
property.description: Consistent page size across all listing views in the UI.

property.name: rbac
property.description: Use FAB-based webserver with RBAC feature.

property.name: navbar_color
property.description: Define the color of navigation bar.

property.name: default_dag_run_display_number
property.description: Default dagrun to show in UI.
